text: Michael David Stevens (born January 23, 1986) is an American educator, public speaker, comedian, entertainer, editor, and internet celebrity. He is best known for creating and hosting the popular education YouTube channel Vsauce. His videos are about the explanations of science, philosophy, culture, and illusion. As the host of Vsauce, Stevens has become one of the most successful YouTubers. He was born in Kansas City, Missouri. In 2017, he created and starred in the YouTube Premium series Mind Field, and presented the nationwide educational stage tour Brain Candy Live! alongside Adam Savage. == Early life == His mother was a teacher assistant and his father was a Chemical Engineer. They moved from Kansas City, Missouri to Stilwell, Kansas in 1991. he grew a passion of learning new stuff. == Vsauce == Vsauce was created on the 30th of July 2007. Vsauce is a massive channel that focus on the more curious side of things. He has a good reputation perceived by the public, and around 2020 - 2025 he started not making much longer videos but more shorts.. Vsauce Views Subscribers Uploads Channel Type Monthly Views Monthly Subscribers Statistics 5,549,000,000 23,600,000 599 Entertainment 169,000,000 300,000 == Curiosity Box == The Curiosity Box was made by Michael Stevens and it went viral, bought by MEL Science for 12 million dollars. Each box costs 100$ each with mixed reviews. Most of them are positive. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Educators from Kansas City, Missouri Category:American editors Category:Comedians from Kansas City, Missouri Category:American YouTubers Category:Writers from Kansas City, Missouri
title: Michael Stevens
